remarks: Introduce an explicit substitution into an implicit substitution hypothesis.  See ~ sbhypf for class substitution version.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Dec-2008.)
statement:
csbhypf.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
csbhypf.2 $e |- F/_ x C $.
csbhypf.3 $e |- ( x = A -> B = C ) $.
csbhypf $p |- ( y = A -> [_ y / x ]_ B = C ) $.
$d x y $.
